1500 + 2000 = 3500
1 + 2 = 3
-1 + 1.0000 = 0
10.1 + 2 = 12.1
10 + 9.9999 = 19.9999
34.999 + 1.0 = 35.999
-5 + 0 = -5
0 + 5 = 5
-5 + 5 = 0
300000000 + 900000000 = 1200000000
900000000 + 900000000 = 1800000000
999999999 + 1 = 1000000000
-1987.50 + 1987 = -0.5
1500 - 2000 = -500 + 500 = 0
6 * 2 + 8 = 20
1500 - 2000 + 0.25 = -499.75
1500 - 2000 + 1.23456789 = -498.76543
1500 - 2000 + 123456789 = 123456289
1500 - 2000 = -500
9 - 3 = 6
-3 - 0 = -3
3 - 0 = 3
-1 - 2.25 = -3.25
1500 - 2000 = -500 - 500 = -1000
6 * 2 = 12 - 8 = 4
9.35 - 1 = 8.35
9 - 1.35 = 7.65
0.29 - 1.35 = -1.06
7.1234567 - 2.2109876 = 4.9124691
1000 + - 10.99 = 989.01
-1.0 + - 989.99
50 + - 60 = -10

1500 - 2000 = -500 - 33.12 = -533.12
-1.33 - 2 = -3.33

7.12345678 - 2.21098765 = 4.91246913
1500 - 2000 = -500 - 12.3456789 = -512.34567
1500 - 2000 = -500 - 123456789 = -123457289
1500 * 2000 = 3000000
6 * 2 = 12
1.212 * 8 = 9.696
3 * 1.212 = 3.636
0.133 * 1.212 = 0.161196
1500 * 0 = 0
-1500 * 2000 = -3000000
-1.212 * 8 = -9.696
-8 * 1.212 = -9.696
1500 - 2000 = -500 * 1.23 = -615
1500 - 2000 = -500 * 123 = -61500
6 * 2 = 12 * 8 = 96
1.23456789 * 2.10987654 ~= 2.60478583
123456789 * 210987654 ~= 2.6047e+16
1500 - 2000 = -500 * 123456789 = -6.172e+10
1500 - 2000 = -500 * 123.456789 = -61728.394
0 * 6 * 6 = 0
1500 / 2000 = 0.75
6 / 2 = 3
0 / 2000 = 0
-1500 / 2000 = -0.75
-3.123 / 5 = -0.6246
-5 / 3.123 ~= -1.6010246
4.21 / 3 ~= 1.40333333
10 / 3.123 ~= 3.20204931
0.234 / 3.123 ~= 0.07492795
(1500 - 2000) / 3.12 ~= -160.25641
(1500 - 2000) / 312 ~= -1.6025641
(6 * 2) / 8 = 1.5
1500 / 0 = inf
6 / 0 = inf
-6 / 0 = -inf
1.23456789 / 2.10987654 ~= 0.58513750
(1500 - 2000) / 1234.56789 ~= -0.4050000
(1500 - 2000) / 123456789 ~= -0.0000040
// -12.3 C = 0
// 12.3 C = 0
// -123 C = 0
// 123 C = 0
// 123456789 C C C = 0
// 1234.56789 C = 0
// -1234.56789 C = 0
// -123456789 C = 0
// 123456789 C = 0
.11111 = 0.11111
0000 = 0
000.11111 = 0.11111
06 = 6
6 * 06 = 36
1111.11111 = 1111.11111
123.567 = 123.567
0.6 = 0.6
.6 = 0.6
6 * 0.6 = 3.6
6 * .6 = 3.6
1.1 = 1.1
12.3456789 = 12.3456789
